title: Lions, Pianos And Boomboxes, Oh My: Movie Artifacts Hit The Auction Block
teaser: Bert Lahr's Cowardly Lion costume from the Wizard of Oz, the piano from Casablanca, and Radio Raheem's boombox from Do the Right Thing are some of the pieces of Hollywood memorabilia that sold at auction Monday night in New York.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
